definitions.definition: The third day of the week in many religious traditions, and the second day of the week in systems that use the ISO 8601 norm; it follows Monday and precedes Wednesday .

main_definition: The third day of the week in many religious traditions, and the second day of the week in systems that use the ISO 8601 norm; it follows Monday and precedes Wednesday .
secondary_definitions: ( Can we verify this sense?) ( informal ) An ordinary , unmemorable day .
